categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Sechel was a rare male Pureblood Sith non-Force-sensitive who served as an advisor and envoy of the Dark Councilor Darth Nyriss of the reconstituted Sith Empire, and previously served in the Imperial Intelligence. His intelligence and highly developed survival skills compensated for his underwhelming stature, and allowed him to rise high in Sith society. When lord Scourge arrived at Darth Nyriss's home, there was immediate animosity between them, which resulted in plotting against each other. He was eventually killed by Scourge around the time that Revan stormed the Emperor's citadel.
